## Introduction
* Speeded interpersonal assessment center exercises (SIACEs) are a new form of assessment center exercises
* SIACEs are scored by human raters

## Methods
* 3 SIACEs were administered to 1,000 participants

## Results
* The machine learning models were able to predict the human ratings with high accuracy

## Discussion
* The machine learning models can be used to score SIACEs automatically
